channel.title: Hoster!
channel.description: Ok guys i need a hoster if you want to host the server for me ill make you an admin ok so just post your email here saying that you want to host! Also post how long do you think you can keep it up for like 20/7 or like 24/7 or something like that. Also you need to know how to set up a no-ip account! [br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 06:40:17 PM[/size][hr]Add me on Hotmail Zammyking111@hotmail.com[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 06:40:38 PM[/size][hr]Comeon!!

item.title: Hoster!

item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok guys i need a hoster if you want to host the server for me ill make you an admin ok so just post your email here saying that you want to host!
